problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, PD is the tangent of ⊙O, point C is the tangent point, and the extended line of PD and AB intersects at point D, connect AC, if ∠D = N_0 ∠CAD, CD = N_1, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接CO,∵PD是⊙O的切线,点C为切点,∴∠OCD=90°,∵AO=CO,∴∠OAC=∠ACO,∴∠COD=2∠CAD,∵∠D=2∠CAD,∴∠COD=∠D,∴CO=DO=2,∴DO=2√{2},∴BD=2√{2}-2．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了切线的性质以及勾股定理、等腰三角形的性质等知识,正确得出DO的长是解题关键．
